subject: Migrate localStorage key from grumpy-campaign-kit to grumpy-cam-canvas
body:
Adds migration from both old keys (social-ad-creator-designs and
grumpy-campaign-kit-designs) so existing users keep their saved designs.

https://claude.ai/code/session_017nbL3isUkuuwX26xRDoLrt
title: Migrate localStorage key from grumpy-campaign-kit to grumpy-cam-canvas
